actions.name: docker-build-and-push-arm64
actions.command: $VERSION=$(cat backstage.json | jq -r '.version'  ); docker buildx build . --file packages/backend/Dockerfile -t aidanhilt/toolshed:$VERSION-arm64 --push

actions.name: docker-build-and-push-amd64
actions.command: $VERSION=$(cat backstage.json | jq -r '.version'  ); docker buildx build . --file packages/backend/Dockerfile -t aidanhilt/toolshed:$VERSION-amd64 --push

actions.name: create-manifest-versioned
actions.command: $VERSION=$(cat backstage.json | jq -r '.version'  ); docker manifest create aidanhilt/toolshed:$VERSION -a aidanhilt/toolshed:$VERSION-arm64 -a aidanhilt/toolshed:$VERSION-amd64
actions.description: Create the manifest for the multi-arch tagged release

actions.name: create-manifest-latest
actions.command: $VERSION=$(cat backstage.json | jq -r '.version'  ); docker manifest create aidanhilt/toolshed:latest -a aidanhilt/toolshed:$VERSION-arm64 -a aidanhilt/toolshed:$VERSION-amd64
actions.description: Create the manifest for the multi-arch latest release

actions.name: push-manifest-versioned
actions.command: $VERSION=$(cat backstage.json | jq -r '.version'  ); docker manifest push aidanhilt/toolshed:$VERSION
actions.description: Push the manifest for the multi-arch tagged release

actions.name: push-manifest-latest
actions.command: $VERSION=$(cat backstage.json | jq -r '.version'  ); docker manifest push aidanhilt/toolshed:latest
actions.description: Push the manifest for the multi-arch latest release
